data.eml:eml: Unaspis lansivora sp. n. (Hemiptera: Diaspididae), a new pest of Lansium domesticum (Meliaceae), and a key to Unaspis species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Watson, Gillian W. (2015): Unaspis lansivora sp. n. (Hemiptera: Diaspididae), a new pest of Lansium domesticum (Meliaceae), and a key to Unaspis species. Zootaxa 3905 (3): 432-440, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3905.3.9
